column2: "Nna Job buaa dɛ
column5: hom nye ɔman no ne ndze! Na sɛ hom wu a

column2: "Na mbom mo so mowɔ ntseasee dɛ homara; Monntɔ mu wɔ hom enyim koraa: Nyew
column3: woana na onnyim ndzɛmba a ɔtse dɛm yi?"

column2: "Metse dɛ obi a ɔyɛ sesɛba wɔ hom enyi do
column3: Nyimpa a ɔfrɛ Nyankopɔn
column5: Nyimpa tsenenee a odzi mu no

column2: "Nyia no ho adwe no no ommbu nyia oruhu amandze no bi wɔ n’adwen mu; Ɔyɛ no dɛ oesiesie ama hɔn a hɔn anan retserew nko."
"Edwotwafo asetsena mu yɛ prɔmprɔm; Mpo hɔn a woyi Nyankopɔn ebufuw so tse hɔ komm; Hɔn a hɔn nyame nye hɔn ahoɔdzen no a."
"Na afei bisa mbowa
column3: na wɔbɛkyerɛkyerɛ wo

column2: "Anaa kasa kyerɛ asaase
column3: na ɔbɛkyerɛkyerɛ wo; Na po mu nam bɛda no edzi akyerɛ wo."

column2: "Woana na onnyim wɔ yinom nyinara mu
column3: Dɛ EWURADZE ne nsa na ɔayɛ iyi?"

column2: "Ɔno ne nsamu na atseasefo nyinara hɔn kra wɔ. Na adasa nyinara hɔn ahom wɔ."
"Ana nnyɛ asowa na ɔsɔ asɛm hwɛ
column3: Dɛ mbrɛ adadaw so sɔ n’edziban hwɛ bi a?"

column2: "Nkɔdaayɛ mu na nyansa wɔ
column3: Na nda tsentsen mu na ntseasee wɔ."

column2: "Ɔno no mu na nyansa na tum wɔ
column3: Ɔno na ɔwɔ apam na ntseasee."

column2: "Hwɛ
column3: ɔno na odwuruw
column4: na wonntum nntow bio; Ɔno na ɔtow nyimpa mu

column2: "Hwɛ
column3: ɔno na ɔkam nsu ma ɔwew; Eso
column4: ɔno na ogyaa mu na ɔpram asaase do."

column2: "Ɔno no mu na ahoɔdzen na nyansa wɔ; Nyia wɔdaadaa no na ɔdaadaafo no nyina yɛ nedze."
"Ɔto apamfo pan dze hɔn kɔ
column3: Na ɔma atsɛmbuafo yɛ nkwasea."

column2: "Ɔno na ɔsansan ahemfo nkyehoma
column3: Na ɔdze abɔdo kyekyer hɔn asen."

column2: "Ɔto asɔfo pan dze hɔn kɔ
column3: Na obutuw akatakyi."

column2: "Ɔno na oyi nokwafo ano kasa kɔ
column3: Na ɔgye mpanyimfo nyimdzee."

column2: "Ɔno na ohue enyimtsiabu gu mbapɔmba do
column3: Na ɔsansan ahoɔdzenfo abɔyamu."

column2: "Ɔno na oyi adze a no mu dɔ edzi fi sum mu
column3: Na ɔdze wu no nwinwin fir edzi ba kan mu."

column2: "Ɔno na ɔma amanaman dɔɔ so
column3: na ɔsɛɛ hɔn: Ɔno na ɔbɔ amanaman mu

column2: "Ɔno na ɔgye asaase do ɔman mu etsitsir hɔn akoma
column3: Na ɔma wokyin wɔ sar do mbrɛ ɔkwan bi nnyi hɔ."

column2: "Wɔkeka wɔ sum a kan nnyi hɔ mu
column3: Na ɔma wokyin dɛ sabokwanyi."
